document.full_text: rising u.s. gasoline prices have damaged confidence in the country's future and forced americans to change their spending habits and lifestyles, a reuters/ipsos poll released on wednesday found.
document.title: high gas prices hurt u.s. confidence: reuters/ipsos poll
lines_and_colors: rising u.s. gasoline prices have damaged confidence in the country's future and forced americans to change their spending habits and lifestyles, a reuters/ipsos poll released on wednesday found.
